01.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
01.text: O dárí jì, Ọmọtẹmi? Ìbàjẹ́ ti di òpin, mo ti gbà gbogbo agbára ayé!
01.translation: Do you surrender, Ọmọtẹmi? The corruption is complete. I now wield all the power of fate!
01.scene_description: Dark clouds swirl as the Rogue Ifá Priest levitates, his staff pulsing with ominous energy.

options.text: Mi ò dárí jì! Mo gbé agbára àwọn Òrìṣà ga!
options.translation: I do not surrender! I call upon the power of the Orisha!

02.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
02.text: Ẹfúùfù! Mo yóò dá afẹ́fẹ́ àìmọ̀lè sílẹ̀ láti gbé ọ lọ!
02.translation: Winds! I summon a storm to sweep you away!
02.scene_description: A violent whirlwind forms, threatening to throw Ọmọtẹmi into the abyss.

options.translation: Summon Erinlẹ̀ (Orisha of the Hunt)
Summon Ọya (Orisha of Winds and Storms)
Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Thunder and Fire)
Summon Olókun (Orisha of the Deep Ocean)

03.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
03.text: Àwọn ojú inú má fi ọ sọfò! Mo yóò fi àbùlè yìí dárí rẹ!
03.translation: Your eyes deceive you! I will drown you in illusions!
03.scene_description: A wave of mirages floods the battlefield, distorting reality.

options.translation: Summon Òsanyìn (Orisha of Knowledge and Healing)
Summon Ògún (Orisha of War and Metal)
Summon Èṣù (Orisha of Trickery and Fate)
Summon Ọbà (Orisha of Strategy)

04.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
04.text: Ìbùkún àwọn baba ń bẹ! Mo fi àwọn èèmọ́ ránṣẹ́ sí ọ!
04.translation: The ancestors will judge you! I summon the spirits of old!
04.scene_description: Ghostly ancestors rise from the ground, their voices echoing ancient wisdom.

options.translation: Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Thunder and Fire)
Summon Òrúnmìlà (Orisha of Wisdom and Divination)
Summon Erinlẹ̀ (Orisha of the Hunt)
Summon Ọbàtálá (Orisha of Purity and Leadership)

05.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
05.text: Ẹ̀mí ayé gbọ́ mi! Ẹ gbà agbára ayé kọ!
05.translation: Spirits of the world, reject the balance!
05.scene_description: The ground trembles violently, threatening to swallow Ọmọtẹmi whole.

options.translation: Summon Ògún (Orisha of War and Earthly Might)
Summon Ọya (Orisha of Winds)
Summon Olókun (Orisha of the Deep Ocean)
Summon Yemoja (Orisha of Motherhood and Water)

06.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
06.text: Mo yóò dá iná pẹ̀lú oró! Oró yóò jà ọ lọ́rùn!
06.translation: I shall burn you with sacred fire! The flames will consume you!
06.scene_description: Sacred fire erupts, surrounding the battlefield.

options.translation: Summon Òrúnmìlà (Orisha of Wisdom)
Summon Yemoja (Orisha of Water)
Summon Olókun (Orisha of Deep Waters)
Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Thunder and Fire)

07.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
07.text: Ojú ọ̀run kò ní rọ̀ mọ́! Mo yóò fi ògún àyíká gbẹ́ ọ!
07.translation: The heavens will close upon you! I will shroud you in endless darkness!
07.scene_description: A thick, supernatural darkness descends, swallowing all light.

options.translation: Summon Òsanyìn (Orisha of Knowledge and Secrets)
Summon Ọbàtálá (Orisha of Light and Clarity)
Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Thunder and Fire)
Summon Erinlẹ̀ (Orisha of the Hunt)

08.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
08.text: Mo dá omi ànírígbẹ̀yìn! Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ omi yóò tán agbára rẹ!
08.translation: I summon the unrelenting flood! The endless waters will drown your strength!
08.scene_description: Massive waves crash, threatening to wash Ọmọtẹmi away.

options.translation: Summon Yemoja (Orisha of Waters and Protection)
Summon Ògún (Orisha of War and Strength)
Summon Olókun (Orisha of the Deep Ocean)
Summon Ọya (Orisha of Winds)

09.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
09.text: Mò dì íwọ nínú wàhálà ayé! Ìkà yóò pa ẹ jù agbára!
09.translation: I bind you in the struggles of the world! Cruelty will break you beyond power!
09.scene_description: Chains of suffering manifest, attempting to trap Ọmọtẹmi.

options.translation: Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Justice and Fire)
Summon Èṣù (Orisha of Paths and Freedom)
Summon Ọbà (Orisha of Sacrifice and Strategy)
Summon Òsanyìn (Orisha of Hidden Knowledge)

10.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
10.text: Mo da agbára ayé yìí sílè! Ìwọ kò ní yege, ayé yóò gbẹ́ ọ!
10.translation: I unleash the full force of the world! You will not prevail; the earth itself rejects you!
10.scene_description: The battlefield shakes violently as raw elemental power erupts.

options.translation: Summon Olókun (Orisha of the Ocean Depths)
Summon Ògún (Orisha of Earth and War)
Summon Òrúnmìlà (Orisha of Wisdom)
Summon Ọbàtálá (Orisha of Purity)

11.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
11.text: Báwo ni? Ìwọ kò lè borí ayé!
11.scene_description: The Rogue Ifá Priest, weakened but still defiant, raises his staff one last time.

options.translation: Summon Ṣàngó (Orisha of Thunder and Fire)
Summon Yemoja (Orisha of Water and Protection)
Summon all the Orisha together!
Summon Ògún (Orisha of War)

final_victory.speaker: Rogue Ifá Priest
final_victory.text: Rárá! Ìwọ kò leṣe! Ìwọ kò le ṣàkóso!
final_victory.translation: No! This cannot be! You cannot command fate!
final_victory.scene_description: The combined power of the Orisha overwhelms the Rogue Ifá Priest, sealing his corruption away.

options.translation: Raise the power of the Orisha high!
